metadata.name: Love, support, keep on...
metadata.description:
This exclusive Art Work was created in unusual way:
It was created exclusively on a phone. (The artist use his fingers on the screen, to mix two photographies he made during a travel.

He mixed the sky he saw from the plane, with these lovershe saw on a boat.

This masterpiece between sky and sea, try to explore the power of Love during hard times.
